"Wanderlust" is a German-language adventure film directed by Thomas Siebel and released in Germany in 2009.
The movie tells the story of Florent, who has built a career and is at the head of a start-up valued at several million euros. However, when he decides to take a break and sets out for a bike tour of Iceland, he realizes that his old life behind him, and that he needs to leave his old life behind him.
